LanguageData.Mousekin_RangedWeapon_Crossbow.label: Mousekin Hunter’s Crossbow
LanguageData.Mousekin_RangedWeapon_Crossbow.descripti: A ranged weapon that elastically launches wooden bolts at distant targets.\n\nThis particular crossbow is mainly used for hunting or self-defense, firing one bolt at a time using fiber or sinew strings under tension, and comes with a miniature crank wheel to allow the relatively weak Mousekins to quickly and easily draw the bow after firing. Its grip and trigger are too small for a human to wield and operate properly.
LanguageData.Mousekin_RangedWeapon_CrossbowAuto.label: Mousekin Automatic Crossbow
LanguageData.Mousekin_RangedWeapon_CrossbowAuto.descr: A ranged weapon that elastically launches wooden bolts at distant targets.\n\nThis particular crossbow is mainly used in combat, firing multiple bolts in quick succession from a removable drum magazine using fiber or sinew strings under tension, and uses a wind-up spring mechanism to automatically reload and fire the next shot. Its grip and trigger are too small for a human to wield and operate properly.
LanguageData.Mousekin_RangedWeapon_MusketLong.label: Mousekin Musket
LanguageData.Mousekin_RangedWeapon_MusketLong.descrip: A slow-firing firearm that propels small, smooth cast iron balls at distant targets, with a longer effective range and greater damage than crossbows. Its grip and trigger are too small for a human to wield and operate properly.
LanguageData.Mousekin_RangedWeapon_MusketShort.label: Mousekin Blunderbuss
LanguageData.Mousekin_RangedWeapon_MusketShort.descri: A slow-firing firearm shorter than the regular Mousekin Musket, with a comparably shorter effective range but capable of great damage against armored targets. Its grip and trigger are too small for a human to wield and operate properly.
